languages.text: [Draft] тут ряженные пришли. Что с ними делать?

traits.locale_text: [Draft] тут ряженные пришли. Что с ними делать?

languages.text: Гвардеец старательно отводит глаза, будто боится встретиться с вами взглядом.
The Guardsman pointedly looks away, as though afraid to meet your gaze.
languages.original_text: Гвардеец старательно отводит глаза, будто боится встретиться с вами взглядом.

traits.locale_text: The guard goes out of his way to avert his eyes, as if afraid to meet yours.
The guard goes out of his way to avert his eyes, as if afraid to meet yours.
The guard goes out of his way to avert his eyes, as though afraid to meet yours.
The guard goes out of his way to avert his eyes, as though afraid to meet yours.
The Guardsman pointedly looks away, as though afraid to meet your gaze.
The Guardsman pointedly looks away, as though afraid to meet your gaze.

languages.text: Der Soldat sieht absichtlich zur Seite, als habe er Angst vor deinem Blick.
languages.original_text: The Guardsman pointedly looks away, as though afraid to meet your gaze.

traits.locale_text: Der Soldat sieht absichtlich zur Seite, als habe er Angst vor deinem Blick.

languages.text: Le garde regarde ostensiblement sur le côté, comme s'il avait peur de croiser votre regard.
languages.original_text: The Guardsman pointedly looks away, as though afraid to meet your gaze.

traits.locale_text: Le garde regarde ostensiblement sur le côté, comme s'il avait peur de croiser votre regard.

languages.text: 这位帝国卫队士兵刻意避开了视线，仿佛害怕与你视线交汇一样。
languages.original_text: The Guardsman pointedly looks away, as though afraid to meet your gaze.

traits.locale_text: 这位帝国卫队士兵刻意避开了视线，仿佛害怕与你视线交汇一样。
这个士兵刻意避开了视线，仿佛害怕与你视线交汇一样。

languages.text: El Guardia aparta la mirada, como si tuviera miedo de mirarte a los ojos.
languages.original_text: The Guardsman pointedly looks away, as though afraid to meet your gaze.

traits.locale_text: El Guardia aparta la mirada, como si tuviera miedo de mirarte a los ojos.

languages.text: ガーズマンはわざと目をそらした。あなたの視線を避けているかのようだった。
languages.original_text: The Guardsman pointedly looks away, as though afraid to meet your gaze.

traits.locale_text: ガーズマンはわざと目をそらした。あなたの視線を避けているかのようだった。

languages.text: Muhafız, göz göze gelmekten korkarcasına başını yana çeviriyor.
languages.original_text: The Guardsman pointedly looks away, as though afraid to meet your gaze.

traits.locale_text: Muhafız, göz göze gelmekten korkarcasına başını yana çevirir.
